channel.title: Henrik Becker - Fullstack .Net Developer
channel.description: Henrik Becker is a fullstack .Net developer and solution architect with over 23 years of experience. He is dedicated to delivering quality software by practicing Agile Processes, Test Driven Development, applying SOLID principles, a healthy dose of DevOps and dad-jokes.

item.title: Self Employed IT Consultant at Henrik Becker Consulting AB
item.description: Providing Fullstack .Net and DevOps expertise on a freelance basis in the Stockholm urban area.

item.title: Fullstack Developer at Magine TV AB
item.description: Continued development of the Video on Demand site Plejmo. Designed version 2 of Plejmo's Rest API. Continued improving the CI/CD processes I set up at Film2Home

item.title: Fullstack Developer at Film2Home AB
item.description: Development of the Video on Demand sites Film2Home and Plejmo. Designed version 1 of Plejmo's Rest API. Automated deployment thus eliminating the human factor and reducing deployment time from 1 hour to a couple of minutes. Increased performance by refactoring from a traditional n-tier architecture to a service bus architcure thus offloading the front end sites.

item.title: IT Consultant at Qbranch Stockholm AB
item.description: Resource consulting at Organizations in Stockholm CBD. Development of Qbranch Competence Manager used for finding the right consultant for an assignment.

item.title: Lead Developer at Wasa Kredit AB
item.description: Reduced complexity through refactoring. Introduced living documentation in the form of executable specifications. Guided development teams towards a more agile approached software development with the product owner, functional analysts, testers and developers working closely together during the entire development cycle.

item.title: IT Consultant at Avega Group AB
item.description: IT Consultant with assignments at Länsförsäkringar, Cale Access, Cash Guard, Tradera and Astando.

item.title: Fullstack Developer at Aftonbladet Tillväxtteknik 2 AB
IT Consultant at Inverso International AB
IT Consultant at Qbranch Stockholm AB
item.description: Fullstack Developer at hitta.se System Integration Consultant assignments at Sigtuna Council, ICA Banken, Taxi Stockholm. Was the single developer on an identity management project at Sigtuna Council that would become Microsoft's reference project for Microsoft Identity Integration Server.

item.title: IT Consultant at eWork
item.description: Web development for Hewlett Packard Sweden

item.title: IT Consultant at IconMedialab AB
item.description: Web development for Hewlett Packard Sweden, Compaq, Siemens Medical and IconMedialab's intranet.

item.title: IT Consultant at Innitek AB
item.description: Developed a document management system based on Visual Basic 5 for Looström & Gelin AB. Built the company web site based on ASP

item.title: Study Circle Leader at Sollentuna Jazz Workshop
Shop Assistant at Kantarellen Livs AB
Shop Assistant at Karena Zoo, Lek & Hobby
